abstract: Iranian state television reports land mine from 1980s Iran-Iraq war killed five Iranian border guards near town of Qasr-e Shirin, 340 miles west of Tehran; similar land mine exploded in same area, killing a female shepherd.
lead_paragraph: Iranian state television said two land mines left over from the 1980s Iran-Iraq war killed six people on Monday, five of them Iranian border guards and the other a female shepherd.

headline.main: Iran: Old Land Mines Kill Six
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Old Land Mines Kill Six

snippet: Iranian state television said two land mines left over from the 1980s Iran-Iraq war killed six people on Monday, five of them Iranian border guards and the other a female shepherd.
